verses.verse: Therefore you shall love <WH157> Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and keep <WH8104> his instructions, <WH4931> and his statutes, <WH2708> and his ordinances, <WH4941> and his commandments, <WH4687> always. <WH3117>

Know <WH3045> this day: <WH3117> for I don't <WH1121> speak with your children who have not known, <WH3045> and who have not seen <WH7200> the chastisement <WH4148> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> his greatness, <WH1433> his mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and his outstretched <WH5186> arm, <WH2220>
and his signs, <WH226> and his works, <WH4639> which he did <WH6213> in the midst <WH8432> of Egypt <WH4714> to Pharaoh <WH6547> the king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and to all his land; <WH776>

and what he did <WH6213> to the army <WH2428> of Egypt, <WH4714> to their horses, <WH5483> and to their chariots; <WH7393> how he made the water <WH4325> of the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220> to overflow <WH6687> them <WH6440> as they pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> you, <WH3068> and how Yahweh has destroyed <WH6> them to this day; <WH3117>
and what he did <WH6213> to you in the wilderness, <WH4057> until you came <WH935> to this place; <WH4725>

and what he did <WH6213> to Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> the sons <WH1121> of Eliab, <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Reuben; <WH7205> how the earth <WH776> opened <WH6475> its mouth, <WH6310> and swallowed them up, <WH1104> and their households, <WH1004> and their tents, <WH168> and every living thing <WH3351> that followed <WH7272> them, <WH7130> in the midst of all Israel: <WH3478>
but your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all the great <WH1419> work <WH4639> of Yahweh <WH3068> which he did. <WH6213>

Therefore you shall keep <WH8104> all the commandment <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day, <WH3117> that you may be strong, <WH2388> and go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> the land, <WH776> where you go <WH5674> over to possess it; <WH3423>

and that you may prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> in the land, <WH127> which Yahweh <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> to them and to their seed, <WH2233> a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>

For the land, <WH776> where you go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it, <WH776> isn't as the land of Egypt, <WH4714> that you came out <WH3318> from, <WH2232> where you sowed your seed, <WH2233> and watered <WH8248> it with your foot, <WH7272> as a garden <WH1588> of herbs; <WH3419>

but the land, <WH776> where you go <WH5674> over to possess <WH3423> it, <WH776> is a land of hills <WH2022> and valleys <WH1237> which drinks <WH8354> water <WH4325> of the rain <WH4306> of the sky, <WH8064>

a land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> cares for: <WH1875> the eyes <WH5869> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> are always <WH8548> on it, <WH7225> from the beginning of the year <WH8141> even to the end <WH319> of the year. <WH8141>

It shall happen, <WH8085> if you shall listen diligently <WH8085> to my commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> you this day, <WH3117> to love <WH157> Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and to serve <WH5647> him with all your heart <WH3824> and with all your soul, <WH5315>

that I will give <WH5414> the rain <WH4306> of your land <WH776> in its season, <WH6256> the former rain <WH3138> and the latter rain, <WH3138> that you may gather <WH622> in your grain, <WH1715> and your new wine, <WH8492> and your oil. <WH3323>
I will give <WH5414> grass <WH6212> in your fields <WH7704> for your livestock, <WH929> and you shall eat <WH398> and be full. <WH7646>
Take heed <WH8104> to yourselves, <WH3824> lest your heart be deceived, <WH6601> and you turn aside, <WH5493> and serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and worship them; <WH7812>

and the anger <WH639> of Yahweh <WH3068> be kindled <WH2734> against you, <WH6113> and he shut up the sky, <WH8064> so that there shall be no rain, <WH4306> and the land <WH127> shall not yield <WH5414> its fruit; <WH2981> and you perish <WH6> quickly <WH4120> from off the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> gives you. <WH5414>

Therefore you shall lay up <WH7760> these my words <WH1697> in your heart <WH3824> and in your soul; <WH5315> and you shall bind <WH7194> them for a sign <WH226> on your hand, <WH3027> and they shall be for symbols <WH2903> between your eyes. <WH5869>

You shall teach <WH3925> them your children, <WH1121> talking <WH1696> of them, <WH3427> when you sit in your house, <WH1004> and when you walk <WH3212> by the way, <WH1870> and when you lie <WH7901> down, <WH6965> and when you rise up.
You shall write <WH3789> them on the door posts <WH4201> of your house, <WH1004> and on your gates; <WH8179>

that your days <WH3117> may be multiplied, <WH7235> and the days <WH3117> of your children, <WH1121> in the land <WH127> which Yahweh <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> them, <WH3117> as the days of the heavens <WH8064> above the earth. <WH776>

For if you shall diligently <WH8104> keep <WH8104> all this commandment <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> you, <WH6213> to do it, <WH157> to love Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> to walk <WH3212> in all his ways, <WH1870> and to cling to him; <WH1692>

then will Yahweh <WH3068> drive out <WH3423> all these nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you, <WH3423> and you shall dispossess nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier than yourselves. <WH6099>

Every place <WH4725> whereon the sole <WH3709> of your foot <WH7272> shall tread <WH1869> shall be yours: <WH4057> from the wilderness, and Lebanon, <WH3844> from the river, <WH5104> the river <WH5104> Euphrates, <WH6578> even to the hinder <WH314> sea <WH3220> shall be your border. <WH1366>

No man <WH376> shall be able to stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> you: <WH3068> Yahweh your God <WH430> shall lay <WH5414> the fear <WH6343> of you and the dread <WH4172> of you on <WH6440> all the land <WH776> that you shall tread <WH1869> on, <WH1696> as he has spoken to you.
Behold, <WH7200> I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you this day <WH3117> a blessing <WH1293> and a curse: <WH7045>
the blessing, <WH1293> if you shall listen <WH8085> to the commandments <WH4687> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which I command <WH6680> you this day; <WH3117>

and the curse, <WH7045> if you shall not listen <WH8085> to the commandments <WH4687> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> but turn aside <WH5493> out of the way <WH1870> which I command <WH6680> you this day, <WH3117> to go <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> which you have not known. <WH3045>

It shall happen, <WH3068> when Yahweh your God <WH430> shall bring you into <WH935> the land <WH776> where you go <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it, <WH5414> that you shall set the blessing <WH1293> on Mount <WH2022> Gerizim, <WH1630> and the curse <WH7045> on Mount <WH2022> Ebal. <WH5858>

Aren't <WH5676> they beyond the Jordan, <WH3383> behind <WH310> the way <WH1870> of the going down <WH3996> of the sun, <WH8121> in the land <WH776> of the Canaanites <WH3669> who dwell <WH3427> in the Arabah, <WH6160> over against <WH4136> Gilgal, <WH1537> beside <WH681> the oaks <WH436> of Moreh? <WH4176>

For you are to pass over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> to go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you, <WH3423> and you shall possess it, <WH3427> and dwell therein.
You shall observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all the statutes <WH2706> and the ordinances <WH4941> which I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you this day. <WH3117>
